name: Atlas-Incident
description:
CONTENT DETAILS:

FOOTAGE OF THE INCIDENT AT ATLAS INC. HQ.

CONTENT CONSISTS OF TWO INDIVIDUALS THAT HAVE BEEN [UNDISCLOSED] BY AN UNIDENTIFIABLE THREAT.

HEADPHONES ARE REQUIRED IN ORDER TO PROPERLY VISUALIZE THE FOOTAGE.

MENU DETAILS:

TO CHANGE OPTION ON THE FOOTAGE MENU, TAP ONCE.

TO SELECT AN OPTION ON THE FOOTAGE MENU, TAP TWICE.

FOOTAGE DETAILS:

THE FOOTAGE DISPLAYS USAGE OF A BUTTON THAT FUNCTIONS AS FOLLOWS:

ONE TAP SWITCHES THE VIEWER'S CAMERA.

TWO TAPS TURNS OFF THE CAMERA AND GENERATOR TO AVOID DIRECT CONTACT WITH [UNDISCLOSED] AND DRAW [UNDISCLOSED] AWAY FROM ITS TARGET.

REPEATED TAPPING ENABLES SECURITY MEASURES IN CASE [UNDISCLOSED] ATTEMPTS TO ENTER THE VIEWER'S ROOM.

KEEPING AT LEAST 3 GENERATORS ACTIVE AT ALL TIMES. IS NECESSARY TO AVOID [UNDISCLOSED].
